definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Number" id="EnchantmentLevel">EnchantmentLevel</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="363" y="33"><field name="trigger">entity_dies</field><next><block type="variables_set_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field><value name="VAL"><block type="item_get_enhancement"><field name="enhancement">CUSTOM:Martyrdom</field><value name="item"><block type="entity_get_armor_slot_item"><value name="slotid"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation elseif="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.1</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_entity_with_rotation"><field name="entity">EntityCreeper</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_number"><field name="VAR">local:EnchantmentLevel</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.2</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_entity_with_rotation"><field name="entity">EntityCreeper</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="yaw"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="strike_lightning"><field name="effectOnly">FALSE</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
